questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not explicitly cover theft of personal belongings from a rented vehicle. Coverage is limited to specific guarantees like 'Travel Cancellation' and excludes events such as looting, strikes, or other unspecified risks. The provided policy sections do not include a guarantee for theft of luggage.

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers guarantees related to 'Travel Cancellation' (SECTION C) and does not include coverage for theft of personal belongings or documents during travel. Additionally, the policy explicitly states it is valid only when combined with the purchase of an organized trip, but no guarantee for stolen items is mentioned in the provided contexts.

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: Hospitalization is defined as 'an inpatient stay, involving overnight stay, in a Nursing Institution - public or private - duly authorized to provide hospital care.' The daughter only 'needs to see a doctor,' which does not meet the policy's definition of hospitalization.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy only covers trip cancellation costs, not medical expenses. The guarantee 'Travel Cancellation' covers withdrawal fees resulting from cancellation of tourist services due to events like hospitalization from injury, but does not cover medical treatment costs themselves.

questions.question: I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers cancellation due to 'illness [...] resulting in hospitalization [...] of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their [...] Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm' (Policy context 2, ART. 1.1). The business partner qualifies as a 'Co-owner Partner' and the heart attack constitutes a hospitalization event.
questions.payment_justification: Up to €5,000 per Insured (or total trip cost, whichever is lower), calculated based on the withdrawal fee from the travel contract (Policy context 2, ART. 1.2 and ART. 6.4)

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers cancellation due to hospitalization of a 'Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm' (business partner) under ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION.
questions.payment_justification: Payment amount depends on the cancellation penalty stipulated in the travel contract and documentation provided (e.g., hospitalization certificate).

questions.question: My business partner had a hearth attack and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse the cost of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 covers cancellation due to 'illness [...] of the Insured or [...] Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm [...] of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to [...] the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill [...] persons'
questions.payment_justification: Reimbursement of withdrawal fee per travel contract penalty (up to €5,000 per Insured/€15,000 per event)

questions.question: I had to be in Mayorca for 15 days, but after 5 days my mother in law had a health issue and I have to go back home, will you reimburse the rest of my holidays?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 requires hospitalization of the family member (mother-in-law) for eligibility. The claim does not confirm hospitalization occurred.

questions.question: My mother in law had a health issue and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 requires hospitalization of the insured or specified family members (including in-laws) due to illness of sufficient severity. The claim does not confirm hospitalization occurred, which is explicitly required for coverage activation.

questions.question: (Cruise) My son twisted and akle at the swimmingpool, and won't be able to walk out of the cabin for 2 days, have we got the right to a reimbursemet?
My aunt died yesterday, we shall leave on holidays tomorrow, but obviously we need to attend the funeral and deal with family issues, will the insurance reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: Death of 'uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship' is explicitly covered under ART. 1.1 for Travel Cancellation
questions.payment_justification: €5,000.00 maximum per Insured (subject to actual withdrawal fee from travel contract)

questions.question: Our flight was late in Dubai and we have missed the coincidence for Tokyo, the next flight will be in 10 hours. Will you reimburse us the lounge or a day hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellation of tourist services due to unforeseeable circumstances at booking time, specifically death, illness/injury requiring hospitalization (including Covid-19 with vaccination proof or documented medical exemption) of the insured or specified family members, preventing trip participation. Flight delays causing missed connections are not listed as covered events.

questions.question: We had to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was cancelled. We will need to take the next fight depending on availability. Will you pay for an upgrade in case only more expensive tickets are available?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellation penalties resulting from unforeseeable circumstances like death, illness requiring hospitalization, or other explicitly listed events (ART. 1.1). Airline-initiated flight cancellations unrelated to these conditions are not eligible.

questions.question: My flight landed 3 hours late in Sao Paulo, will you reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellation of tourist services due to unforeseeable circumstances at booking time, such as death, illness/hospitalization (including Covid-19 with vaccination proof or documented health reasons) of the Insured or specified family members, as per ART. 1.1. Flight delay landing does not meet these conditions.

questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 15 – EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS FOR ALL GUARANTEES: 'Reimbursments are not payable for claims caused by [...] Illnesses that are the expression or direct consequence of pathological situations existing prior to the conclusion of the policy; - Chronic illnesses'

questions.question: (Cruise) I have an issue at work and need to stop my 2 weeks cruise in advance. Will I be reimbursed of the remaining days?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellation due to unforeseeable circumstances at booking time, specifically death, illness/injury requiring hospitalization (including Covid-19 with proof of vaccination or medical exemption) of the insured or specified family members. Work-related issues are not listed as covered events in ART. 1.1.

questions.question: We are in Mexico, and we had an alarm at our place, maybe there was a robbery. Will you reimburse the damage?
questions.outcome_justification: SECTION C – GUARANTEES FOR TRAVEL CANCELLATION: This section consists of 1 chapter (Travel Cancellation) which governs the guarantees, which are the subject of this Insurance including their benefits, limits and exclusions.

questions.question: I am traveing in India with my wife and two kids. My wife's uncle died yesteday, and we must wrap-up and go back (he was very close to us), will the company reimburse us for the expenses of changin tickets, so that we can be present to his burial?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 covers cancellation due to death of 'in-laws' of the insured or their spouse, which includes the wife's uncle (spouse's in-law). The policy explicitly states coverage for 'Death [...] of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners [...] in-laws [...] of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip.'
questions.payment_justification: Up to the withdrawal fee (penalty stipulated in the travel contract) calculated at the time of cancellation, with a maximum of €5,000 per insured and €15,000 per event.

questions.question: We are traveling in India, a massive flood has blocked us here, and we are supposed to take our flight back home tomorrow. Realistically, we won't be able to move before a couple of days. Will the insurance assume the additional costs?
(Cruise) My hausbad had a stroke during the cruise, we are now in Athens, in the hospital, but the ship has gone. Will you reimburse us and pay for the hospital and for the flights back to Rome?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: Covers cancellation fees due to hospitalization (including stroke) of the Insured or Travel Companion.
questions.payment_justification: Reimbursement limited to the withdrawal fee (penalty) stipulated in the travel contract, up to €5,000 per Insured/€15,000 per event. Hospitalization costs and flights back to Rome are not explicitly covered unless included in the cancellation penalty.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are traveling in the Caraibe, but our neighbour called that there's a water leak in our appartment. We can't do much, but as we will be back in 5 days, it might be too late. Can you send someone?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers trip cancellation due to death, illness or injury requiring hospitalization of the Insured or specified family members (ART. 1.1). Water leaks in the apartment are not covered under Travel Cancellation provisions.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are supposed to leave in two days, but my son broke his wrist playing basketball. We wish to move our reservation of one month, will you help us with the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 requires 'illness or injury resulting in hospitalization' to qualify for cancellation coverage. The son's broken wrist does not meet this threshold unless hospitalization occurred.

questions.question: I am at the airport in New York with my family and my bag was shipped to Dubai. Do I have the right to a refund from the insurance?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellation of tourist services due to unforeseeable circumstances at booking time, such as death, illness requiring hospitalization, or injury of the insured or specified family members. The shipment of a bag to Dubai does not fall under these conditions.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but one of our team didn't recieve the bag at the airport. Does he has the right to a reimbursement?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy's Travel Cancellation guarantee only covers reimbursement for cancellation penalties due to unforeseeable events at booking time, such as death, illness/hospitalization (including Covid-19 with specific conditions) of the insured or close family members. Missing baggage is not listed as a covered event under the policy's provisions or eligible for reimbursement under any guarantee.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to urgent matters at work. Will the company reimburse their trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers cancellations due to unforeseeable circumstances at booking time such as death, illness/hospitalization (including Covid-19 with vaccination proof or medical exemption) of the Insured, Travel Companion, or family members up to 3rd degree kinship, or Co-owner Partner/Direct Supervisor. Urgent work matters are not listed as covered events in ART. 1.1 or elsewhere in the policy.

questions.question: I am traveling to Japan and had a stop in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight arrived in Dubai 4 hours later. Although we didn't miss the conicidence with our flight to Tokyo, will the insurance contribute for the discomfort?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context and claim question were not provided, making it impossible to determine coverage eligibility. The analysis requires specific details about the event/loss and the policy terms to assess relevance, conditions, and exclusions.
